pageContent: Purpose: We assessed the outcomes of high intensity focused ultrasound as primary treatment of localized prostate cancer in a retrospective series. This represents one of the largest published series of patients at intermediate and high risk.

metaData.source:
Salvage radiotherapy after high-intensity focussed ultrasound for recurrent localised prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/20598436/
